list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a substance or matter in a state in which it will expand freely to fill the whole of a container, having no fixed shape (unlike a solid) and no fixed volume (unlike a liquid).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: hot balls of gas that become stars
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những quả bóng khí nóng trở thành ngôi sao

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an entertaining or amusing person or situation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the party would be a gas
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bữa tiệc sẽ là một loại khí

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: kill or harm by exposure to poisonous gas.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: my son was gassed at Verdun
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Con trai tôi đã bị gầm tại Verdun

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: talk, especially excessively, idly, or boastfully.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I thought you'd never stop gassing
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi nghĩ bạn sẽ không bao giờ ngừng khí
